ACTION_SENT_TO_CALDAV: Request sent to CalDAV server. Please wait...
ADD_A_CALDAV_ACCOUNT: You need to add atleast one CalDav Account
ADD_FROM_TEMPLATE_DESC: Select a template to add a task or event.
ALREADY_INSTALLED: MMDL has already been installed. Redirecting...
ALREADY_SYNCING: Sync already in process. Please wait.
ATTENDEES_DESC: Enter one attendee per line in this format: AttendeeName, email@example.com
CALDAV_ALREADY_EXISTS: CalDAV account has already been added.
CANT_CREATE_EMPTY_TASK: Can't submit an event or a task with no summary.
CANT_MOVE_TO_SAME_CALENDAR: Can't move item to the same calendar.
CANT_REACH_CALDAV_ACCOUNT: Can't reach CalDAV account. Check logs.
DELETE_ACTION_SENT_TO_CALDAV: Delete request sent to CalDAV. Please wait...
DELETE_CALDAV_ACCOUNT_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete the following CalDAV account?
DELETE_EVENT_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete this event?
DELETE_USER_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
DUPLICATE_WEBCAL: WebCAL link has been already added.
ERROR_ENTER_A_SUMMARY_FOR_ALARM: Summary is mandatory if the Alarm is of the type 'Email'.
ERROR_ENTER_A_DESC_FOR_ALARM: Description is mandatory if the Alarm is of the type 'Display' or 'Email'.
ENTER_TEMPLATE_DATA: Template data is not set. You can set it by clicking the button 'Create'.
ERROR_ADDING_CALENDER: Calendar couldn't be added. Check the console log
ERROR_DB_CON_ERROR: Error connecting to database. Check your database settings. Here's some more information:
ERROR_EMAIL_SENDING_FAILED: Server responded: Error while sending email.
ERROR_ENDDATE_SMALLER_THAN_START: End date and due date must be after start date.
ERROR_GENERIC: Something went wrong. Please try again later. Try checking logs for more details.
ERROR_GETTING_SETTINGS: Error getting settings. See console logs.
ERROR_INVALID_VALUE_OPENID_PROVIDER: Invalid value of NEXT_PUBLIC_OPEN_ID_PROVIDER was provided as environment variable.
ERROR_LOGIN_WITH_PASSWORD: Server reponded: User already regisered. Kindly login.
ERROR_PASSWORD_RESET_FAILED: Password reset failed. Please try again.
ERROR_PICK_A_CALENDAR: Please pick a calendar for the event.
ERROR_RRULE_UNTIL_BEFORE_START: Until date cannot be before start date.
ERROR_START_DATE_REQUIRED_FOR_RECCURENCE: Start date is required with recurrence rules.
ERROR_LINK_LOOKS_INVALID: WebCAL link looks invalid. Will still add though.
EVENT_NEEDS_BOTH_FROM_AND_TO: Event needs both a 'From' and 'To' date.
FILTER_RESULT_DESC: Your current parameters will create the following filter:
GANTT_VIEW_HELP: Double click on the task to edit.
GANTT_VIEW_HELP_2: You can also drag and drop tasks to edit start and due date.
GANTT_VIEW_HELP_3: Click on 'Today' to jump to today's date.
INSTALL_SUCESSFUL: MMDL was installed successfully! If this is a new installation, you may now proceed to create your first account, which would be the default admin account.
LABEL: Label
MANAGE_FILTERS_DESC: You can manage your filters here.
MMDL_NOT_INSTALLED: Database tables for MMDL have not been installed. Click this banner to install.
NAME: Name
NO_ACCESS_TO_DB: You don't have access to database specified in your configuration. Check your database settings in your .env file.
NUKE_DEXIE_ON_LOGOUT_DESC: If enabled, when the user logs out, the local data, which includes almost all data on your CalDAV server (eg. events, tasks), is removed from storage. This ensures that no one else with access to your device can read the data after logout. The downside of turning it on means the data will have to be refetched from your CalDAV server everytime you login.
PLEASE_LOGIN: User not logged in. Login and try again.
QUICK_ADD_DESC1:
To make it quicker to add tasks, we have a quick add syntax that you can use to assign a due date, labels, or priority to a task.
These will be only triggered if you try to add tasks via add task bar.
READY_TO_INSTALL: Your database settings seem fine. You're all set for installation.
REPEAT_TASK_MESSAGE: This is a repeating task. Some changes (like summary, description, etc.) you make will affect all instances. Current instance being edited:
RRULE_EMPTY_FREQ: Please select a frequency of recurrence.
SAMPLE_CURRENT_TIME: Sample Output for Date and Time
SHOW_TASKS_WITH_NO_DUE: Show tasks with no due date
START_DAY_CALENDAR_WEEK: Starting Day of the Week for Calendar View
TASK_HAS_ANY_OF_LABELS: Task has any of these labels
TASK_HAS_A_MINIMUM_PRIORITY_OF: Task has a minimum priority of
USER_REG_DISABLED_FROM_ENV: User registration is disabled from env variable. You'll need to change the value there to enable it.
